title: CNN+ launches today, won’t be available on Android TV and Google TV initially
content:
CNN+ is launching today as a premium streaming service on top of the major news network, with additional original programming and more. Unfortunately, CNN+ is launching without an app for Google TV and Android TV.

more…

The post CNN+ launches today, won’t be available on Android TV and Google TV initially appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: CNN+ is launching today with a news-focused premium streaming offering, but the service isn't available on Google TV just yet.
